title: Kadhal Valarthaen Lyrics Manmadhan
stanzas:
Kadhal Valarthaen Song Lyrics From Manmadhan
#YuvanShankarRaja #KK #NaMuthukumar

Kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
unmel naanum naanum pulla
kadhal valarthaen

kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
en usurukkulla koodu katti
Kadhal valarthaen

idhayathin ulle
penne naan sedi onnu
naan vachi valarthaen

indru adhil poovaai
neeye thaan
poothavudane
kadhal valarthaen

ye pull pulla
una enga pudichen
ye pull pulla
adha kandu pudichen

ye pulla pulla
unna kannil pudichen
ye pulla pulla
unna nenjil vedhachen.
ye pulla.

Kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
unmel naanum naanum pulla
kadhal valarthaen

kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
en usurukkulla koodu katti
Kadhal valarthaen

poovin kaattru ariyume
ennai unmanam ariyaadhaa
pootti vaitha
en aasai megangal
unnai paarthadhum
pozhiyaadhaa.

pala kodi pengalthaan
boomiyile vazhalaam

oru paarvaiyaal
manadhai parithu
sendraval neeyadi

eunakenave kathirundhaale
kaaladiyil vergalum
mulaikkum
kadhalil valiyum
inbam thaane, maane..

unadhu per ezhudhu pakkathula
enadhu peyarai naanum
ezhudhi vechchen

adhu mazhayil nanaiyaama
kuda pudichen.
mazhai vittum naan
nananjen..

ye pull pulla
una enga pudichen
ye pull pulla
adha kandu pudichen

ye pulla pulla
unna kannil pudichen
ye pulla pulla
unna nenjil vedhachen.
ye pulla.
kadhal valarthaen..

unnai thavira ingu
enaku yaaradi
unnadhu nizhaliye
oaiveduppen

unadhu swasathin
soodu theendinaal
maranam vandhu naan
uyirthezhuven

un mugathai paarkkave
en vizhigal vazhudhe
piriyum nerathil paarvai
izhakkiren naanadi

udal porul aavi enaithum
unakenave tharuven penne
unnarugil vazhthaal
podhum kannae kannae

thandhi anbu adhu
pirakkum varai.
thaaiyin anbu adhu
valarum varai

thozhi oruthi varum
tharum anbo
uyirodu vazhum varai
adiye ye pulla pulla

Kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
unmel naanum naanum pulla
kadhal valarthaen

kadhal valarthaen
Kadhal valarthaen
en usurukkulla koodu katti
Kadhal valarthaen

idhayathin ulle
penne naan sedi onnu
naan vachi valarthaen

indru adhil poovaai
neeye thaan
poothavudane
kadhal valarthaen

ye pull pulla
una enga pudichen
ye pull pulla
adha kandu pudichen

ye pulla pulla
unna kannil pudichen
ye pulla pulla
unna nenjil vedhachen.
ye pulla.
